recipe1: 2 oz vodka, 0.5 oz lime juice, 4–6 oz ginger beer
recipe2: Add vodka and lime juice to a copper mug with ice, top with ginger beer, stir gently, and garnish with lime and mint.

recipe1: 1.5 oz vodka, 1 oz Cointreau or triple sec, 0.5 oz lime juice, 0.5 oz cranberry juice
recipe2: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled coupe or cocktail glass, and garnish with a lime wheel or orange twist.

recipe1: 2 oz vodka, 4 oz tomato juice, 0.5 oz lemon juice, 2 dashes Worcestershire sauce, 2 dashes hot sauce, pinch of salt and pepper
recipe2: Build in a pint glass with ice, stir gently, and garnish with celery, lemon, or pickles.

recipe1: 2 oz vodka, 0.5 oz coffee liqueur, 1 oz fresh espresso, 0.25 oz simple syrup (optional)
recipe2: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass, garnished with three coffee beans.

recipe1: 2 oz vodka, 1 oz coffee liqueur, 1 oz heavy cream or milk
recipe2: Build over ice in an old fashioned glass and stir gently.

recipe1: 2.5 oz vodka, 0.5 oz dry vermouth
recipe2: Stir or shake with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail or martini glass, and garnish with a twist or olive.

recipe1: 2 oz vodka, 4 oz orange juice
recipe2: Build over ice in a highball glass, stir, and garnish with an orange slice.

recipe1: 1.5 oz vodka, 0.5 oz peach schnapps, 1.5 oz cranberry juice, 1.5 oz orange juice
recipe2: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a highball glass over fresh ice, garnished with an orange wedge or cherry.

recipe1: 2 oz vodka, 4 oz cranberry juice
recipe2: Build over ice in a highball glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

recipe1: 2 oz vodka, 1 oz lemon juice, 0.5 oz simple syrup, top with club soda
recipe2: Shake vodka, lemon juice, and syrup with ice, strain into a Collins glass over ice, and top with club soda and lemon.

recipe1: 2 oz vodka, 1 oz coffee liqueur
recipe2: Build over ice in an old fashioned glass and stir gently.

recipe1: 2 oz vodka, 2 oz cranberry juice, 2 oz pineapple juice
recipe2: Build over ice in a highball glass and garnish with a lime wedge or pineapple slice.

recipe1: 2 oz vodka, 3 oz cranberry juice, 1 oz grapefruit juice
recipe2: Build over ice in a highball glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

recipe1: 2 oz vodka, 1 oz lemon juice, 0.5 oz triple sec, 0.5 oz simple syrup
recipe2: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass, garnish with a sugared rim and lemon twist.

recipe1: 2 oz vodka, 4 oz grapefruit juice
recipe2: Shake or build in a highball glass with a salted rim and garnish with a grapefruit slice.

recipe1: 2 oz vodka, 4 oz tonic water
recipe2: Build over ice in a highball glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

recipe1: 1 oz vodka, 1 oz triple sec, 1 oz lime juice
recipe2: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled shot glass or serve in a coupe.

recipe1: 1.5 oz vodka, 3 oz orange juice, 0.5 oz Galliano
recipe2: Build vodka and juice over ice in a highball glass, float Galliano on top and garnish with an orange slice.

recipe1: 1.5 oz vodka, 1 oz blue curaçao, 4 oz lemonade
recipe2: Shake or build in a highball glass over ice and garnish with a lemon wheel or cherry.

recipe1: 1.5 oz vodka, 1 oz cream of coconut, 2 oz pineapple juice
recipe2: Blend with crushed ice and serve in a hurricane or highball glass, garnish with pineapple and cherry.

recipe1: 2 oz gin, 4 oz tonic water
recipe2: Build over ice in a highball glass and garnish with a lime wedge or cucumber.

recipe1: 2 oz gin, 1 oz lemon juice, 0.5 oz simple syrup, top with club soda
recipe2: Shake gin, lemon juice, and syrup with ice, strain into a Collins glass over ice, and top with soda and lemon.

recipe1: 1 oz gin, 1 oz Campari, 1 oz sweet vermouth
recipe2: Stir over ice in an old fashioned glass and garnish with an orange peel.

recipe1: 2.5 oz gin, 0.5 oz dry vermouth
recipe2: Stir with ice, strain into a chilled martini glass, and garnish with an olive or lemon twist.

recipe1: 2 oz gin, 0.5 oz maraschino liqueur, 0.25 oz crème de violette, 0.75 oz lemon juice
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a coupe glass, and garnish with a cherry.

recipe1: 1 oz gin, 0.5 oz lemon juice, 0.5 oz simple syrup, 3 oz Champagne
recipe2: Shake first three ingredients with ice, strain into a flute, and top with Champagne and lemon twist.

recipe1: 2 oz gin, 0.75 oz lemon juice, 0.75 oz honey syrup
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled coupe glass, and garnish with a lemon twist.

recipe1: 0.75 oz gin, 0.75 oz green Chartreuse, 0.75 oz maraschino liqueur, 0.75 oz lime juice
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a coupe glass, and serve with no garnish.

recipe1: 1.5 oz gin, 0.5 oz raspberry syrup, 0.75 oz lemon juice, 1 egg white
recipe2: Dry shake, then shake with ice, strain into a coupe glass, and serve up.

recipe1: 2 oz gin, 1 oz lime juice, 0.75 oz simple syrup
recipe2: Shake with ice and strain into a coupe or cocktail glass, garnish with a lime wheel.

recipe1: 2 oz gin, 1 oz lime juice, 0.75 oz simple syrup, 6–8 mint leaves
recipe2: Shake with ice and fine strain into a coupe glass, garnish with mint.

recipe1: 2 oz gin, 1 oz lemon juice, 0.75 oz simple syrup, top with soda water
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a Collins glass over fresh ice, and top with soda.

recipe1: 1.5 oz gin, 0.5 oz apple brandy, 0.5 oz lemon juice, 0.25 oz grenadine, 1 egg white
recipe2: Shake all ingredients well, strain into a coupe glass, and serve up.

recipe1: 1.5 oz gin, 0.75 oz triple sec, 0.75 oz lemon juice
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a coupe glass, and garnish with a lemon twist.

recipe1: 0.75 oz gin, 0.75 oz Cointreau, 0.75 oz Lillet Blanc, 0.75 oz lemon juice, dash absinthe
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a coupe glass rinsed with absinthe, and serve immediately.

recipe1: 2 oz gin, 0.75 oz lemon juice, 0.5 oz simple syrup, 0.5 oz crème de mûre
recipe2: Shake all but liqueur, strain into an old fashioned glass with crushed ice, and float crème de mûre on top.

recipe1: 2 oz gin, 1 oz heavy cream, 0.5 oz lemon juice, 0.5 oz lime juice, 0.75 oz simple syrup, 1 egg white, 2 drops orange flower water, top with soda
recipe2: Dry shake, then shake with ice, strain into a fizz glass, and top with soda.

recipe1: 2 oz gin, 0.5 oz lime juice, top with club soda
recipe2: Build over ice in a highball glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

recipe1: 2 oz gin, 0.5 oz lime juice, 4–6 oz ginger beer
recipe2: Build over ice in a copper mug or highball glass and garnish with lime and mint.

recipe1: 2 oz gin, 1 oz lemon juice, 0.75 oz simple syrup, handful of basil leaves
recipe2: Muddle basil with lemon and syrup, add gin, shake with ice, strain into a rocks glass with ice, and garnish with basil.

recipe1: 2 oz white rum, 1 oz lime juice, 0.75 oz simple syrup
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a coupe glass, and garnish with a lime wheel.

recipe1: 2 oz white rum, 1 oz lime juice, 0.75 oz simple syrup, 6–8 mint leaves, soda water
recipe2: Muddle mint with lime and syrup, add rum, shake lightly, strain into a highball glass with ice, and top with soda.

recipe1: 1 oz light rum, 1 oz dark rum, 0.5 oz lime juice, 0.5 oz orange curaçao, 0.25 oz orgeat syrup
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a rocks glass with crushed ice, and garnish with mint and lime.

recipe1: 2 oz white rum, 1 oz cream of coconut, 1 oz heavy cream, 3 oz pineapple juice
recipe2: Blend with crushed ice, serve in a hurricane glass, and garnish with pineapple and cherry.

recipe1: 2 oz light rum, 4 oz cola, 0.5 oz lime juice
recipe2: Build over ice in a highball glass, stir, and garnish with a lime wedge.

recipe1: 2 oz dark rum, 4 oz ginger beer, 0.5 oz lime juice
recipe2: Build over ice in a highball glass and garnish with lime.

recipe1: 1.5 oz dark rum, 1.5 oz light rum, 1 oz orange juice, 1 oz pineapple juice, 0.25 oz grenadine
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a hurricane glass with ice, and garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

recipe1: 2 oz white rum, 0.75 oz grapefruit juice, 0.5 oz lime juice, 0.5 oz maraschino liqueur
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a coupe glass, and garnish with lime.

recipe1: 2 oz aged rum, 0.75 oz lemon juice, 0.5 oz simple syrup, optional egg white
recipe2: Shake (dry first if using egg white), strain into a coupe glass, and garnish with a lemon twist.

recipe1: 2 oz dark rum, 1 oz lime juice, 0.5 oz simple syrup, 2 dashes Angostura bitters
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a highball glass, and garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

recipe1: 1.5 oz dark rum, 0.75 oz Campari, 0.5 oz lime juice, 0.5 oz simple syrup, 1.5 oz pineapple juice
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a rocks glass with ice, and garnish with pineapple or lime.

recipe1: 1 oz light rum, 1 oz dark rum, 1 oz overproof rum, 0.5 oz lime juice, 0.5 oz grapefruit juice, 0.5 oz cinnamon syrup, 0.25 oz grenadine
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a tiki or hurricane glass, and garnish with mint and cherry.

recipe1: 1 oz light rum, 1 oz brandy, 0.75 oz lime juice, 0.5 oz orange juice, 0.5 oz orgeat
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a tiki mug or rocks glass with ice, and garnish with orange and cherry.

recipe1: 1 oz white rum, 1 oz dark rum, 1 oz demerara rum, 0.75 oz lime juice, 0.75 oz grapefruit juice, 0.5 oz honey syrup
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a rocks glass with crushed ice, and garnish with mint.

recipe1: 1.5 oz white rum, 0.75 oz dry vermouth, 0.25 oz orange curaçao, 1 dash grenadine
recipe2: Stir with ice, strain into a coupe glass, and garnish with an orange twist.

recipe1: 2 oz rhum agricole, 0.25 oz cane syrup, lime coin
recipe2: Stir with ice in a rocks glass and garnish with the lime coin.

recipe1: 2 oz dark rum, 1 tbsp spiced butter batter, 4 oz hot water
recipe2: Build in a mug, stir to dissolve the batter, and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

recipe1: 2 oz white rum, 1 oz lime juice, 0.75 oz simple syrup, 1 cup crushed ice

recipe1: 1 oz Jamaican rum, 1 oz Campari, 1 oz sweet vermouth
recipe2: Stir with ice, strain into a rocks glass over ice, and garnish with orange peel.

recipe1: 1.5 oz Bacardi rum, 0.75 oz lime juice, 0.5 oz grenadine
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a coupe glass, and garnish with lime.

recipe1: 2 oz tequila, 1 oz lime juice, 0.75 oz triple sec or Cointreau

recipe1: 2 oz tequila, 4 oz orange juice, 0.5 oz grenadine

recipe1: 2 oz tequila, 0.5 oz lime juice, pinch of salt, top with grapefruit soda
recipe2: Build over ice in a highball glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

recipe1: 2 oz tequila, 0.5 oz lime juice, top with Topo Chico or sparkling water
recipe2: Build over ice in a highball glass and garnish with lime.

recipe1: 2 oz tequila, 0.5 oz lime juice, 4 oz ginger beer
recipe2: Build in a copper mug over ice and garnish with lime and mint.

recipe1: 2 oz tequila, 1 oz pineapple juice, 0.5 oz lime juice
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with lime.

recipe1: 2 oz tequila, 4 oz tomato juice, 0.5 oz lime juice, 2 dashes Worcestershire, 2 dashes hot sauce, salt and pepper
recipe2: Build over ice in a pint glass, stir gently, and garnish with celery and lime.

recipe1: 2 oz tequila, 0.5 oz crème de cassis, 0.5 oz lime juice, top with ginger beer
recipe2: Build over ice in a highball glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

recipe1: 2 oz tequila, 0.75 oz lemon juice, 0.5 oz simple syrup, optional egg white
recipe2: Shake (dry first if using egg white), strain into a coupe glass, and garnish with a lemon twist.

recipe1: 2 oz tequila, 1 oz lemon juice, 0.5 oz simple syrup, top with club soda
recipe2: Shake first three ingredients with ice, strain into a Collins glass, and top with soda and lemon.

recipe1: 2 oz tequila, 1 oz lime juice, 0.75 oz triple sec, 2–3 jalapeño slices

recipe1: 1 oz tequila, 1 oz Campari, 1 oz sweet vermouth
recipe2: Stir with ice, strain into a rocks glass, and garnish with orange peel.

recipe1: 2 oz tequila, 1 oz lime juice, 0.75 oz simple syrup, handful of mint or basil

recipe1: 1.5 oz reposado tequila, 0.5 oz mezcal, 1 tsp agave syrup, 2 dashes Angostura bitters
recipe2: Stir with ice, strain into a rocks glass, and garnish with orange twist.

recipe1: 1.5 oz tequila, 0.5 oz sweet vermouth, 0.5 oz dry vermouth, 0.5 oz Campari, dash Angostura bitters

recipe1: 2 oz tequila, 0.5 oz lime juice, top with cola

recipe1: 2 oz tequila, top with soda water
recipe2: Build over ice in a highball glass and garnish with a grapefruit or lime wedge.

recipe1: 2 oz tequila, 0.75 oz lime juice, 0.5 oz agave syrup, 3 cucumber slices

recipe1: 2 oz tequila, 1 oz lime juice, 1 oz orange juice, 1 oz grapefruit juice, pinch of salt, top with grapefruit soda
recipe2: Build in a clay cup or highball glass over ice and garnish with citrus slices.

recipe1: 2 oz bourbon or rye, 1 sugar cube, 2 dashes Angostura bitters, splash of water
recipe2: Muddle sugar, bitters, and water in a rocks glass, add whiskey and ice, and stir with an orange peel garnish.

recipe1: 2 oz bourbon, 0.75 oz lemon juice, 0.5 oz simple syrup, optional egg white
recipe2: Shake (dry first if using egg), strain into a rocks or coupe glass, and garnish with a cherry or lemon twist.

recipe1: 2 oz rye whiskey, 1 oz sweet vermouth, 2 dashes Angostura bitters

recipe1: 2 oz bourbon, 0.5 oz simple syrup, 8–10 mint leaves

recipe1: 1 oz bourbon or rye, 1 oz Campari, 1 oz sweet vermouth

recipe1: 2 oz rye whiskey, 1 sugar cube, 2 dashes Peychaud’s bitters, absinthe rinse

recipe1: 1.5 oz Irish whiskey, 4 oz hot coffee, 0.5 oz demerara syrup, whipped cream

recipe1: 2 oz Scotch whisky, 1 oz sweet vermouth, 2 dashes Angostura bitters

recipe1: 2 oz bourbon, 0.75 oz lemon juice, 0.75 oz honey syrup

recipe1: 1.5 oz bourbon, 1 oz grapefruit juice, 0.5 oz honey syrup
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a coupe glass, and garnish with a grapefruit twist.

recipe1: 2 oz rye or bourbon, 0.75 oz lemon juice, 0.5 oz simple syrup, 0.5 oz red wine

recipe1: 0.75 oz bourbon, 0.75 oz Aperol, 0.75 oz Amaro Nonino, 0.75 oz lemon juice
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a coupe glass, and garnish with a lemon twist.

recipe1: 1.5 oz Scotch, 0.75 oz Drambuie
recipe2: Build in a rocks glass over ice and stir gently.

recipe1: 2 oz bourbon, 0.75 oz lemon juice, 0.5 oz simple syrup, 4–6 mint leaves

recipe1: 1.5 oz Scotch, 0.5 oz amaretto
recipe2: Build in a rocks glass over ice and stir gently.

recipe1: 2 oz rye, 0.75 oz dry vermouth, 0.25 oz maraschino liqueur, 0.25 oz Amer Picon or Amaro
recipe2: Stir with ice, strain into a coupe glass, and garnish with a cherry or orange twist.

recipe1: 1.5 oz rye, 0.75 oz dry vermouth, 0.75 oz pineapple juice
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a coupe glass, and serve up.

recipe1: 2 oz bourbon, 0.5 oz Cointreau, 0.5 oz sweet vermouth, 0.5 oz lemon juice
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a coupe glass, and garnish with cherry or lemon peel.

recipe1: 0.5 oz Kahlúa, 0.5 oz Baileys Irish Cream, 0.5 oz Grand Marnier

recipe1: 1 oz vodka, 1 oz Kahlúa, 1 oz Baileys Irish Cream

recipe1: 2 oz vodka, 1 oz Kahlúa, 1 oz heavy cream
recipe2: Build over ice in a rocks glass and stir gently.

recipe1: 2 oz vodka, 1 oz Kahlúa
recipe2: Build over ice in a rocks glass and stir gently.

recipe1: 2 oz vodka, 0.5 oz Kahlúa, 1 oz fresh espresso
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled coupe glass, and garnish with 3 coffee beans.

recipe1: 2 oz amaretto, 0.75 oz lemon juice, 0.25 oz simple syrup
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a rocks glass, and garnish with a cherry and lemon wheel.

recipe1: 1.5 oz vodka, 0.5 oz amaretto
recipe2: Build in a rocks glass with ice and stir gently.

recipe1: 1.5 oz Scotch, 0.75 oz Drambuie
recipe2: Build over ice in a rocks glass and stir gently.

recipe1: 1.5 oz vodka, 3 oz orange juice, 0.5 oz Galliano
recipe2: Build vodka and orange juice in a highball glass, float Galliano on top, and garnish with an orange slice.

recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a rocks glass with ice, and garnish with grated nutmeg.

recipe1: 2 oz Cognac, 0.75 oz white crème de menthe
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a rocks glass or coupe, and serve without garnish.

recipe1: 1 oz green crème de menthe, 1 oz white crème de cacao, 1 oz cream
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled coupe glass, and garnish with mint or chocolate.

recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve up.

recipe1: 2 oz Cognac, 1 oz orange liqueur (Cointreau), 0.75 oz lemon juice
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a coupe glass with a sugared rim, and garnish with orange peel.

recipe1: 1 oz Cognac, 1 oz rum, 1 oz Cointreau, 0.75 oz lemon juice
recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a coupe glass, and garnish with a lemon twist.

recipe1: 1.5 oz Cognac, 0.75 oz amaretto
recipe2: Build over ice in a rocks glass and stir gently.

recipe2: Shake with ice, strain into a rocks glass, and garnish with a cherry or lemon wheel.

recipe2: Build over ice in a rocks glass and stir gently.
